nodes.text: Ryloth Vent was a subsidiary of the InterGalactic Banking Clan that went bankrupt during the Clone Wars.

Ryloth Vent was first mentioned under the name Ryloth Ventures in the 2003 Star Wars Legends Jedi: Aayla Secura. It was established to be canon by "An Old Friend," the fifth episode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' sixth season.
